title: Great acting by brothers.
review:
Alex and Nat both acted really well.
A great watch.

title: An easy enjoyable film.
review: I could see myseld and my brother, well my whole family in the picture. And I didn't ever know if the dialogue was written or not, that's the biggest compliment I could ever give to a film. So Watch it and have fun!

title: It was just okay
review:
What I liked about this movie was the realness of the script. At some parts... it was a bit inappropriate, but that actually added to the movie I think. Also, the brothers seem to have a great relationship in real life and it shows on camera.

I was rooting for the older brother, since he was more mature and not as obnoxious. It was nice to see the brothers put their relationship before a girl. The moms boyfriend was a good addition to the script, since it showed the boys progression with their manners during the movie.

I don't know, I didn't hate this movie, but it wasn't great either.
